key_risks: Legal and regulatory risks including labor lawsuits and environmental compliance issues
Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global disruptions
Dependence on e-commerce sector for revenue
Merger-related risks with Aebi Schmidt Group
Competition and market pressures in the EV space
controversies: Lawsuit under the Fair Labor Standards Act (FLSA) filed by Deandre Gray
Investigation by Monteverde & Associates PC into potential claims against Shyft Group and its board of directors
environmental_issues: Scrutiny by the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) for potential violations of the Clean Air Act
social_issues: Labor violations and potential reputational damage from lawsuits
governance_issues: Leadership changes, including the appointment of an interim CFO during a critical merger period
